Scott McCloud explains:

"Nobody embodies the concept of closure - the phenomenon of observing parts but perceiving the whole. In comics, the magic happens between the panels, in the gutter. Nobody IS that gutter space made manifest!"

Will Wright's Notes:

"In The Sims, we simulate needs and wants. But Nobody transcends simulation - they're the emergent behavior we never coded but always hoped would appear. Pure procedural poetry!"
